amendment.description: An amendment to increase funding for the National Park Service maintenance backlog by $11,500,000,000.

action.text: Mr. Calvert raised a point of order against the Beyer amendment (A012). Mr. Calvert stated that the amendment seeks to cause a net increase in budget authority in violation of the provisions of H.Res. 5. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Beyer.
